item.title: Blockchain use cases
item.description: Trust Over IP: Hyperledger Ursa, Indy, and Aires # https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FfuhlF9ZYPM Notes # prove the credential without CA trusted issuer (eg: gov) issues the identity token (eg: driving licence) -> send it to a crypto account (like sending btc to someone) on the blockchain, it shows a record that the account owns that licence.
